title: What are we doing to our children, locked up, locked out
brief_description: A poignant case history of a damaged, unstable family and a child’s resultant antisocial behavioral problems. Issues arising from this case are child advocacy in the courts and the rehabilitative effect of jailing juvenile delinquents. From the series CBS reports.
